title: Rural Municipality of Poplar Valley No. 12
text:
The Rural Municipality of Poplar Valley No. 12 (<a href="Canada%202016%20Census">2016 population</a>: ) is a <a href="List%20of%20rural%20municipalities%20in%20Saskatchewan">rural municipality</a> (RM) in the <a href="Provinces%20and%20territories%20of%20Canada">Canadian province</a> of <a href="Saskatchewan">Saskatchewan</a> within <a href="Division%20No.%203%2C%20Saskatchewan">Census Division No. 3</a> and <a href="SARM%20Division%20No.%202">Division No. 2</a>. It is located in the southern portion of the province. It is adjacent to the United States boundary, neighbouring <a href="Daniels%20County%2C%20Montana">Daniels County</a> in <a href="Montana">Montana</a>.
History.
The RM of Poplar Valley No. 12 incorporated as a rural municipality on January 1, 1913.
Geography.
Communities and localities.
The following <a href="List%20of%20municipalities%20in%20Saskatchewan%23Urban%20municipalities">urban municipalities</a> are surrounded by the RM.
The following unincorporated communities are within the RM.
Demographics.
In the <a href="2016%20Canadian%20Census">2016 Census of Population</a> conducted by <a href="Statistics%20Canada">Statistics Canada</a>, the RM of Poplar Valley No. 12 recorded a population of living in of its total private dwellings, a change from its 2011 population of . With a land area of , it had a population density of in 2016.
In the <a href="2011%20Canadian%20Census">2011 Census of Population</a>, the RM of Poplar Valley No. 12 recorded a population of , a change from its 2006 population of . With a land area of , it had a population density of in 2011.
Government.
The RM of Poplar Valley No. 12 is governed by an elected municipal council and an appointed administrator that meets on the second Wednesday of every month. Current <a href="Reeve%20%28Canada%29">reeve</a> is Darrel Swanson, while its administrator is Lynn Fisher. Sitting Councelors as of the 2020 election are:
Terry Loucks - Division 1
Kalissa Regier - Division 2
Richard Kimball - Division 3
Kendra Loucks - Division 4
Brad Christopherson - Division 5
Calvin Knoss - Division 6
Transportation.
The RM is a part owner of the <a href="Fife%20Lake%20Railway">Fife Lake Railway</a>.
